thread.title: N J Layton
thread.title_full: Porcelanosa evaluado por N J Layton

author: N J Layton
title: N J Layton
text:
Really pleased with service provided by Cordelle and Paul, who I dealt with in Porcelanosa Sheffileld. Despite it taking me several visits to make up my mind. They were always polite, accommodating and very knowledgeable.
To see the bathroom, just as they designed it. Is just amazing. Beautiful!
Thank you so much and Im sure Ill be back for my Kitchen
